headline: Union Pacific Corporation (UNP): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Union Pacific Corporation on R. Dennis’s Substack by OppCost. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on UNP. Union Pacific Corporation’s share was trading at $266.66 as of February 24th. UNP’s trailing and forward P/E were 20.38 and 18.35, respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
